page.title: 10 Occupations in Wootton.
page.content:
Our school sent out a questionnaire to all our parents and friends of the school. We found that the largest group of men worked in manufacturing industry or in building. The largest group of women worked as housewives or had a part-time job in a shop or as a nurse. A few people said that they worked as managers or directors.
Of the people who replied to the question on family income:
3 had between 1000 and 5000 3 had between 5000 and 8000 11 had between 8000 and 10000 14 had between 10000 and 15000 12 had over 15000
